thread.title: Carrollton
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Carrollton

author: Carrollton
title: Carrollton
text: The only drawback is the purchase was for a charity raffle that raises money for scholarships in Carrollton. I wish they had offered to donate the chair, however, they refused. The price was low and I hope it raises enough money to cover our cost. Since they did not donate, we cannot include the store's name or address in our Raffle Booklet or Program for the event. Over 400 people attend and over 700 would have seen the store's name on line. That $99 would have been well spent on marketing had they donated!
